web.ser
Class LongLivedCookie

java.lang.Object
  javax.servlet.http.Cookie
      web.ser.LongLivedCookie
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable
public class LongLivedCookie
extends javax.servlet.http.Cookie

Cookie that persists 1 year. Default Cookie doesn't persist past current session.

Taken from Core Servlets and JavaServer Pages from Prentice Hall and Sun Microsystems Press, http://www.coreservlets.com/. © 2000 Marty Hall; may be freely used or adapted.
